name: Average Zoey 101 Quiz | 10 Questions | For Children

questions.text: Who does NOT appear in the second season?
questions.explanation:
Dana.

	Dana is in France in the second season.  Lola is Nicole and Zoey's new roommate.

questions.text: What subject does Chase tutor Lola in?
questions.explanation:
biology.

	Chase is tutoring Lola in Biology because she doesn't understand it.  She bribes him with pie.

questions.text: What is the name of Quinn's alpaca?
questions.explanation:
Otis.

	Otis visits PCA because Quinn misses him.  Quinn wanted to run away from PCA.

questions.text: Lola asks Logan out in the second season.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Lola asks Chase out, not Logan.  Chase thinks about it and then agrees.

questions.text: Who is Zoey and Nicole's roommate in the second season?
questions.explanation:
Lola.

	Lola is kind of weird.  She talks to the dead.  Lola has taken the place of Dana, who is in France in the second season.

questions.text: In the episode "Spring Break-up", who is the captain of the girl's team?
questions.explanation:
Zoey.

	Chase is the captain of the boy's team.  Logan wanted to be captain, but the rest of the boys wanted Chase to be captain.

false.

	Nicole and Lola are roommates.  Zoey is also roommates with them.

questions.text: What does Logan put in the time capsule?
questions.explanation:
a picture of himself.

	Logan thinks that the people of the future will want to see how handsome he is.  He even autographs the picture.

pink.

	Dana's Jet-X is purple.  Nicole's Jet-X is blue.

questions.text: In the episode "People Auction", Zoey wants a spring roll.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Zoey wants a tempura roll, not a spring roll, in this episode.
